agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF WORK SESSION COMMITTEE: Natural Resources TIME & DATE: Upon adjournment of public hearing Thursday, January 31, 2019 PLACE: San Antonio CHAIR: Rep. Lyle Larson The committee will depart for a tour of the San Antonio Water System Brackish Groundwater Desalination facility and Aquifer Storage and Recovery Project upon adjournment of the public hearing. The tour will be at the following address: SAWS H2Oaks Center, 4588 Harty Rd Elmendorf, TX 78112.
